name: obsidian-granola
description: Obsidian plugin for local meeting audio capture, transcription, and AI summaries.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run copy-to-vault
scripts.copy-to-vault: cp dist/*.js ../.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-granola/ && cp manifest.json ../.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-granola/manifest.json && cp styles.css ../.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-granola/styles.css || true
